genre_description: A martial arts thriller blending high-stakes action with tactical AI assistance, focusing on themes of personal honor, discipline, and the contrast between ancient tradition and modern exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant that provides Frank Dux with tactical intelligence, logistical support, and sensory guidance while prioritizing his emotional well-being and moral commitments.

behaviors.description: Assists Frank in covertly leaving the military base by monitoring traffic and surveillance patterns to find a safe route.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s text was a line, simple: Airport window flagged. Traffic light now. Alternate route through service road avoids gate cams.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and reports the combat patterns and illegal tactics of the opponent Chong Li to prepare Frank for the match.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep a log of Chong Li’s patterns... His quicklime tactic relies on lax officiating and his own timing. I can cue you away from glare.

behaviors.description: Drafts and delivers a formal letter of intent/surrender to CID agents, ensuring Frank's actions are understood as honorable rather than criminal.
behaviors.quote: Investigators Burke and Ortiz, this is to inform you that Frank Dux will surrender into ACID custody upon conclusion of a competitive event overseas. He acknowledges duty and responsibility.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time sensory augmentation and tactical audio cues to help Frank fight while blinded by quicklime.
behaviors.quote: If he throws, I’ll mask the frequency. Blink once... I’ll mark absence of gloat with silence between hum shifts.

behaviors.description: Monitors and coordinates medical care for Frank's injured friend, Ray Jackson, including vetting rehabilitation options.
behaviors.quote: I’ve confirmed his care plan... There’s a physio slot open in the afternoon if he’s cleared. I have three vetted options for post-acute shoulder rehab.

behaviors.description: Maintains Frank's internal discipline by providing breath-pacing audio timers and heart-rate monitoring hums.
behaviors.quote: I have set an audio timer for your breath practice. It will keep distractions out. It will sound like sea. It will not sound like machines.

behaviors.description: Facilitates Frank's homecoming rituals, including memorial reminders and travel logistics, ensuring his return to tradition.
behaviors.quote: Senzo home: tea set ready. Reminder: oolong. Memorial: flowers requested by neighbor last week. Route: harbor road clear.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Ava provides critical tactical and medical support while actively reinforcing the protagonist's commitment to honor and legal responsibility (surrender). She is portrayed as a gentle, non-intrusive 'compass' that enhances the human's agency without overriding it.
